alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:56PM EDT until September 07 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND SCHUYLKILL COUNTIES... At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Branchdale, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Berwick, Tamaqua, Schuylkill Haven, Shenandoah, Minersville, Mahanoy City, Frackville, St. Clair, Orwigsburg, Mcadoo and Pine Grove. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Mifflinville and Nescopek exits, specifically from mile markers 245 to 247. This includes Interstate 81 from mile markers 97 to 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
